page.title: 04Interview with Pakenham P.C.
page.content: The Police Constable told us that he had been in the force for 20 years and he has been responsible for Pakenham for 3 years.He works from the Ixworth Police Station where there is a Sergeant and 6 Constables.We also learned the following : There have been no murders in recent memory,about one suicide per year,no Policemen hurt in the course of their duty.Burglary from homes is the common est crime,together with thefts from cars.During May there were 4 thefts from cars in Fen Road,and petrol has been siphoned from parked cars. Missing persons are not at all common. Most reported cases were children who had not informed parents of a visit to friends etc. Thefts of crops were not on a large enough scale to be reported to the police,however a man who was poaching hares from (cont. p5)
